name: AL_WriteReq
AL_ReadReq
func:
msg.Start = '08 00'; //Startbyte
msg.Revision = '02'; //Protokoll Revision 02
msg.Command = '02'; // Kommando
msg.IOLPort = '00'; //Port Nummer
msg.LowIndex = '52'; //IO-Link Index 
msg.HighIndex = '00'; //IO-Link Index (meiï¬‚tens 00)
msg.SubIndex = '01'; //IO-Link SubIndex 

msg.PL = msg.payload; //Payload of inject

msg.hex = msg.Start +" "+ msg.Revision +" "+ msg.Command +" "+ msg.IOLPort +" "+ msg.LowIndex +" "+ msg.HighIndex +" "+ msg.SubIndex;

return msg;

name: WriteProcessDataReq
ReadProcessDataReq
func:
msg.Start = '05 00'; //Startbyte
msg.Revision = '02'; //Protokoll Revision 02 
msg.Command = '0A'; // Command number in HEX
msg.IOLPort = '00'; //Port Nummer 255 for all Ports

msg.PL = msg.payload; //Payload of inject

msg.hex = msg.Start +" "+ msg.Revision +" "+ msg.Command +" "+ msg.IOLPort;

return msg;

name: SM_SetPortConfig tdb... Port Konfigurieren
func:
msg.Start = '36 00';//36 rev2, 44 rev3, 00
msg.Revision = '02'; //Protokoll Revision 02
msg.Command = '0F'; // In Hex
msg.IOLPort = '00'; // In Hex
msg.PortModeDetail = '01'; //in count of Hex Bytes
msg.Data = '03'; //port data in HEX
msg.PL = msg.payload; //Payload of inject


msg.hex = msg.Start +" "+ msg.Revision +" "+ msg.Command +" "+ msg.IOLPort +" "+ msg.Data +" "+ msg.PortModeDetail;

return msg;

name: GetPortConfig tdb... Wie ist der Port Konfiguriert?

msg.Start = '36 00';//36 rev2, 44 rev3, 00
msg.Revision = '02'; //Protokoll Revision 02
msg.Command = '0F'; // In Hex
msg.IOLPort = '00'; // In Hex
msg.PortModeDetail = '01'; //in count of Hex Bytes
msg.Data = '03'; //port data in HEX
msg.PL = msg.payload; //Payload of inject


msg.hex = msg.Start +" "+ msg.Revision +" "+ msg.Command +" "+ msg.IOLPort +" "+ msg.Data +" "+ msg.PortModeDetail;

return msg;

name: internal_temp_actual
AL_ReadReq BAW temp Array
func:
msg.Start = '08 00'; //Startbyte
msg.Revision = '02'; //Protokoll Revision 02
msg.Command = '02'; // Kommando
msg.IOLPort = global.get('BIP001M'); //Port Nummer
msg.LowIndex = '52'; //IO-Link Index 
msg.HighIndex = '00'; //IO-Link Index (meiï¬‚tens 00)
msg.SubIndex = '00'; //IO-Link SubIndex 

msg.PL = msg.payload; //Payload of inject

msg.hex = msg.Start +" "+ msg.Revision +" "+ msg.Command +" "+ msg.IOLPort +" "+ msg.LowIndex +" "+ msg.HighIndex +" "+ msg.SubIndex;

return msg;
